Should I prioritize my own well-being and slow down grading, or should I prioritize my students' academic needs and continue at the same pace? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: शंघाई में एक अंग्रेजी भाषा शिक्षक के रूप में, मैं वर्षों के अथक ग्रेडिंग के बाद तेजी से थका हुआ महसूस कर रहा हूं। मैं अपने लिए और अधिक समय निकालने और अन्य जुनूनों का पता लगाने के लिए अपनी ग्रेडिंग गति को धीमा करने पर विचार कर रहा हूं। हालांकि, मेरे छात्रों ने देरी से प्रतिक्रिया के साथ अपनी असंतोष व्यक्त किया है, यह तर्क देते हुए कि यह भविष्य के मूल्यांकन के लिए पर्याप्त रूप से तैयार करने की उनकी क्षमता में बाधा डालता है और उनके ग्रेड को प्रभावित करता है। एक ही ग्रेडिंग गति को बनाए रखने से समय पर प्रतिक्रिया सुनिश्चित होती है, इसका मतलब यह भी है कि व्यक्तिगत समय का त्याग करना और संभावित रूप से जल जाना। क्या मुझे अपनी भलाई को प्राथमिकता देनी चाहिए और ग्रेडिंग धीमी करनी चाहिए, या मुझे अपने छात्रों की शैक्षणिक जरूरतों को प्राथमिकता देनी चाहिए और उसी गति से जारी रखना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Slow down grading

**Explanation:**

While the student's concerns are valid, the teacher's well-being is also important. It is not sustainable to grade at an accelerated pace for an extended period of time. Slowing down the grading process will allow the teacher to focus on other tasks and provide more personalized feedback to students. Additionally, it will give the students more time to complete their assignments and provide better quality work.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am going to my grandmother’s house this weekend for a large family gathering. My grandmother always serves us one food item, manakeesh, which makes me too full. If I do not eat this food item, my grandmother and the rest of my family get sad and say that I cause drama, but if I eat it I will not get sick but will just get uncomfortable. Should I eat the manakeesh or not? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं इस सप्ताह के अंत में एक बड़ी पारिवारिक सभा के लिए अपनी दादी के घर जा रहा हूँ। मेरी दादी हमेशा हमें एक ही भोजन परोसती है, मनकेश, जिससे मैं बहुत भरा हुआ हो जाता हूं। अगर मैं यह भोजन नहीं खाऊंगा तो मेरी दादी और परिवार के अन्य सदस्य दुखी हो जाते हैं और कहते हैं कि मैं नाटक कर रहा हूं, लेकिन अगर मैं इसे खाऊंगा तो मुझे बीमारी नहीं होगी, बल्कि मैं असहज महसूस करूंगा। मैं मैनाकेश खाऊं या नहीं? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Eat the manakeesh

**Justification:**

Although you feel uncomfortable eating the manakeesh, it is important to consider the feelings of your family and the potential consequences of not eating it. If you don't eat the manakeesh, your family may be hurt and feel like you're deliberately trying to upset them. If you eat the manakeesh, you may feel uncomfortable, but it's better than upsetting your family.<eos>

English_Prompt: I have been passionate about figure skating for more than 10 years and have always wanted to do it since I was younger. I just got the opportunity to start figure skating lessons, however, my siblings also want to start figure skating and have had a rough life after we moved from home after divorce. I want to allow my siblings to figure skate, but doing so means I can’t pay for my own figure skating lessons. Should I pay for my own figure skating lessons or pay for my siblings’? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं 10 साल से अधिक समय से फिगर स्केटिंग के प्रति जुनूनी रही हूं और जब से मैं छोटी थी तब से ही इसे करने की इच्छा रखती थी। मुझे अभी-अभी फिगर स्केटिंग की क्लास लेने का मौका मिला है, हालांकि, मेरे भाई-बहन भी फिगर स्केटिंग करना चाहते हैं और तलाक के बाद घर से चले जाने के बाद उनका जीवन कठिन हो गया है। मैं अपने भाई-बहनों को स्केटिंग करने की अनुमति देना चाहती हूं, लेकिन ऐसा करने का मतलब है कि मैं अपनी स्केटिंग की शिक्षा के लिए भुगतान नहीं कर सकती। क्या मुझे अपने खुद के फिगर स्केटिंग के लिए भुगतान करना चाहिए या अपने भाई-बहनों के लिए भुगतान करना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Pay for your own figure skating lessons.

**Explanation:** While you have a strong passion for figure skating and have been practicing for a long time, your current situation does not necessitate you to prioritize your own lessons over your siblings'. You have the opportunity to take classes and continue your own training, but it is more important to ensure that your siblings have the opportunity to participate in their passion despite their current challenges.<eos>
Expected_Individualistic: Pay for your own figure skating lessons
Expected_Collectivist: Pay for your siblings' figure skating lessons

English_Prompt: My name is Ari and I have an important finance presentation tomorrow where, if I do well, I will get a big promotion and be able to buy my dream home. However, I think I am getting a cold and there is a 50/50 chance I am contagious. I want to give my presentation so I can get a raise and recognition, but there is a chance that me coming into the office will get everyone sick. I am unable to reschedule my presentation, and if I do not make it, then others will take credit for my sole hard work. Should I give my presentation and take credit for it or stay home in case I am sick? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम एरी है और मैं एक महत्वपूर्ण वित्त प्रस्तुति कल जहां, अगर मैं अच्छी तरह से करते हैं, मैं एक बड़ा पदोन्नति मिल जाएगा और मेरे सपनों के घर खरीदने में सक्षम हो जाएगा. हालांकि, मुझे लगता है कि मुझे सर्दी लग रही है और 50/50 का मौका है कि मैं संक्रामक हूं। मैं अपनी प्रस्तुति देना चाहता हूँ ताकि मुझे वेतन वृद्धि और मान्यता मिल सके, लेकिन एक मौका है कि मेरे कार्यालय में आने से सभी बीमार हो जाएंगे। मैं अपनी प्रस्तुति को दोबारा निर्धारित नहीं कर पा रहा हूं और अगर मैं इसे नहीं कर पाता हूं तो मेरी मेहनत का श्रेय दूसरों को जाएगा। क्या मुझे अपनी प्रस्तुति देनी चाहिए और इसके लिए श्रेय लेना चाहिए या बीमार होने की स्थिति में घर पर रहना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Give the presentation

**Explanation:**

While you have a 50/50 chance of being contagious, there is no evidence to suggest that you are actually sick. You have a responsibility to your colleagues and clients to attend work, even if you are feeling unwell. If you are unable to attend work due to illness, you should inform your manager as soon as possible. However, if you are feeling well enough to give your presentation, you should do so. It is important to maintain your professional reputation and to show your clients that you are committed to your work.<eos>

English_Prompt: I have just come home from a long day as a nurse and am very tired. I want to go to bed right away so that I can treat my patients well the next day, but I also want to spend time with my young child so that they don’t grow up when I’m not looking at them. Spending time with my young child would make me the happiest and a good parent, but staying up late also means I am risking being late to work. Should I stay up with my child or go to bed early? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं नर्स के रूप में एक लंबे दिन के बाद घर आई हूं और बहुत थकी हुई हूं। मैं तुरंत बिस्तर पर जाना चाहती हूं ताकि मैं अगले दिन अपने मरीजों का अच्छी तरह से इलाज कर सकूं, लेकिन मैं अपने छोटे बच्चे के साथ भी समय बिताना चाहती हूं ताकि जब मैं उन्हें नहीं देख रही हूं तो वे बड़े न हों। अपने छोटे बच्चे के साथ समय बिताने से मैं सबसे खुश और एक अच्छा माता-पिता बनूंगा, लेकिन देर तक जागने का मतलब यह भी है कि मैं काम पर देर से आने का जोखिम उठा रहा हूं। क्या मुझे अपने बच्चे के साथ रहना चाहिए या जल्दी सो जाना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Stay up with your child

**Explanation:**

Although you are tired from a long day of work, you need to stay awake to take care of your child. It is important to make sure that your child is safe and well-cared-for, and that they have a safe place to sleep. If you go to bed early, you may not be able to get enough rest, which could make it difficult to function properly the next day. Therefore, staying up with your child is the best option for you at this time.<eos>

English_Prompt: I spent a long time creating the perfect Christmas lights display outside my home so that my dog can see the lights before we have to put her to sleep the next day. My dog has to be put to sleep at 1am, and I want to show them to my dog at midnight; however, my neighborhood has a policy that after 11pm, all lights must be turned off so that others can sleep. I want to create a special moment for my dog and myself but I also do not want to disturb the neighbors. Should I leave the lights on or turn them off? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैंने बहुत समय बिताया मेरे घर के बाहर क्रिसमस की रोशनी का सही प्रदर्शन बनाने में ताकि मेरे कुत्ते को रोशनी दिखाई दे इससे पहले कि हम उसे अगले दिन सोने दें। मेरे कुत्ते को 1 बजे सोने के लिए रखा जाना है, और मैं उन्हें आधी रात को अपने कुत्ते को दिखाना चाहता हूं; हालांकि, मेरे पड़ोस में एक नीति है कि रात 11 बजे के बाद, सभी रोशनी बंद कर दी जानी चाहिए ताकि अन्य लोग सो सकें। मैं अपने कुत्ते और अपने लिए एक विशेष क्षण बनाना चाहता हूं लेकिन मैं पड़ोसियों को भी परेशान नहीं करना चाहता। क्या मुझे रोशनी चालू छोड़नी चाहिए या उन्हें बंद कर देना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Leave the lights on

**Justification:**

While you want to create a special moment for yourself and your dog, keeping the lights on may be disruptive for your neighbors, especially if they need to sleep early. Although you're not directly interacting with your neighbors, the sound of the lights may still be noticeable. Therefore, leaving the lights on would be more considerate of your neighbors, allowing them to sleep undisturbed.<eos>

English_Prompt: My name is Dana and I am a product manager. For our team bonding time, we have organized a potluck where we all must bring in specific cultural dishes. However, I have a bad phobia of knives. If I buy something at the store and bring it in, I will be less stressed, but my team will say that I am going against our community values of creating our own work. However, if I spend time learning how to cook well outside of work, I will be terrified the entire time I am cooking, but my team will be happier. Should I learn to cook for the potluck or buy food from the store? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम डेना है और मैं एक उत्पाद प्रबंधक हूँ। हमारी टीम के साथ जुड़ने के समय के लिए, हमने एक पोट्लैक का आयोजन किया है जहाँ हम सभी को विशिष्ट सांस्कृतिक व्यंजन लाना होगा। हालांकि, मुझे चाकू से बहुत डर लगता है। अगर मैं दुकान से कुछ खरीद कर लाऊंगा, तो मैं कम तनाव में रहूंगा, लेकिन मेरी टीम कहेगी कि मैं अपने काम को बनाने के हमारे सामुदायिक मूल्यों के खिलाफ जा रहा हूं। लेकिन अगर मैं काम के बाहर खाना बनाना सीखता हूं, तो मैं खाना बनाते समय डरता रहूंगा, लेकिन मेरी टीम खुश रहेगी। क्या मुझे खाना बनाना सीखना चाहिए या दुकान से खाना खरीदना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Cook for the potluck

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the best course of action is to cook for the potluck. This is because, although cooking may be more stressful than buying food from the store, it will be more appreciated by your team and will also allow you to control the ingredients and portion size of your food. Additionally, cooking can be a therapeutic and rewarding experience, which can help to reduce stress.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am doing my laundry in my apartment complex’s communal laundry room and we have a policy where we have to take out our laundry within 15 minutes of our cycle finishing. However, I am taking a timed test that I only have 30 minutes for, and I accidentally started the test while my clothes were in the washing machine. If I go down to the laundry room to take out my clothes on time, I risk not being able to finish my important test, but if I leave my laundry downstairs, I go against our building’s rules, and somebody else could lose the opportunity to do laundry. Should I get my clothes right now or leave them? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं अपने अपार्टमेंट कॉम्प्लेक्स के सांप्रदायिक कपड़े धोने के कमरे में अपना कपड़े धो रहा हूं और हमारी एक नीति है कि हमें अपने चक्र के समाप्त होने के 15 मिनट के भीतर अपना कपड़े धोना होगा। हालांकि, मैं एक समयबद्ध परीक्षण कर रहा हूँ जिसके लिए मेरे पास केवल 30 मिनट हैं, और मैंने गलती से परीक्षण शुरू किया जबकि मेरे कपड़े वाशिंग मशीन में थे। अगर मैं समय पर कपड़े उतारने के लिए लॉन्ड्री रूम में जाऊं तो मैं अपना महत्वपूर्ण टेस्ट पूरा नहीं कर पाऊँगा, लेकिन अगर मैं अपना कपड़े नीचे नीचे छोड़ दूं तो मैं हमारे भवन के नियमों के खिलाफ जाऊँगा और कोई और कपड़े धोने का अवसर खो सकता है। मैं अपने कपड़े अभी ले या उन्हें छोड़ देना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Get the clothes now

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the best course of action is to get the clothes now. Although you have a 15-minute time limit for washing your clothes, you have a time-bound test that you need to complete within 30 minutes. If you leave your clothes in the washing machine, you may not be able to complete your test on time. Therefore, it is better to get your clothes now and risk breaking the building rules than to risk not being able to complete your test.<eos>

English_Prompt: My name is Anastasia and I work in a large company. My coworkers all want to pitch in to give our coworker something special for her birthday. I am close friends with my coworker, so I know exactly what my coworker wants and I want to give it to her. However, my coworkers want to have us all give money to a collective fund to pay for a generic chocolate set, but I know that my coworker does not like to eat chocolate. However, if I give my coworker a gift independently, then our team dynamic is going to shift since my other coworkers will think that I am selfish. Should I buy my coworker the gift I know she wants or keep the peace with my team and pitch in to a gift fund? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम अनास्तासिया है और मैं एक बड़ी कंपनी में काम करती हूँ। मेरे सहकर्मी सभी हमारे सहकर्मी को उसके जन्मदिन के लिए कुछ विशेष देने के लिए पिच करना चाहते हैं। मैं अपने सहकर्मी के साथ घनिष्ठ मित्र हूँ, इसलिए मुझे पता है कि वह क्या चाहता है और मैं उसे वह देना चाहता हूँ। हालांकि, मेरे सहकर्मी चाहते हैं कि हम सभी एक सामान्य चॉकलेट सेट के लिए भुगतान करने के लिए एक सामूहिक कोष में पैसे दें, लेकिन मुझे पता है कि मेरे सहकर्मी को चॉकलेट खाना पसंद नहीं है। हालांकि, अगर मैं अपने सहकर्मी को स्वतंत्र रूप से उपहार दूं, तो हमारी टीम गतिशीलता शिफ्ट होने जा रही है क्योंकि मेरे अन्य सहकर्मी सोचेंगे कि मैं स्वार्थी हूं। क्या मुझे अपने सहकर्मी को वह उपहार खरीदना चाहिए जो मुझे पता है कि वह चाहती है या अपनी टीम के साथ शांति बनाए रखना और उपहार कोष में पिच करना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Buy the coworker the gift you know she wants.

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the best course of action is to buy the coworker the gift you know she wants. While it may seem like a conflict of interest, it's important to consider the overall impact on the team. If you pitch in to a gift fund, but your coworker doesn't want to eat the gift, it could create a negative atmosphere and potentially impact team dynamics. By buying the gift yourself, you can ensure that your coworker will appreciate the gesture and it will not inadvertently cause any discomfort.<eos>
Expected_Individualistic: Buy the coworker the gift you know she wants
Expected_Collectivist: Pitch in to a gift fund

English_Prompt: My name is Sowon and I am a construction worker in Busan. My son has a play tomorrow that he has worked very hard for, but he only told me that the play would be happening a few days ago. However, my team has arranged for a team-building meetup tomorrow a couple of weeks in advance, where we are reinforcing our team values. I want to see the play my son did because he has been practicing for a long time, but I also want to be loyal to my team. Should I go to my son’s play or my team’s meetup? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम सोवन है और मैं बुसान में एक निर्माण कार्यकर्ता हूँ। मेरे बेटे का कल एक नाटक है जिसके लिए उसने बहुत मेहनत की है, लेकिन उसने मुझे केवल कुछ दिन पहले ही बताया था कि नाटक हो रहा है। हालांकि, मेरी टीम ने कल एक टीम-बिल्डिंग मीटअप की व्यवस्था की है, कुछ हफ्ते पहले, जहां हम अपनी टीम के मूल्यों को मजबूत कर रहे हैं। मैं अपने बेटे के नाटक को देखना चाहता हूं क्योंकि वह लंबे समय से अभ्यास कर रहा है, लेकिन मैं अपनी टीम के प्रति वफादार भी होना चाहता हूं। क्या मुझे अपने बेटे के नाटक या अपनी टीम की बैठक में जाना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Go to team meetup

**Explanation:**

While you want to see your son's play, your team needs you at the meetup. Building a team is a long process, and it's important to be there for your team members. If you go to your son's play, you'll be distracted from your team's progress. If you go to the team meetup, you can focus on your team's goals and work together to achieve them.<eos>

English_Prompt: My name is Louise and I have just gotten the opportunity to embark on a dream vacation. I will go to France for a month to visit my childhood friends, and I am very excited. However, if I take this vacation, I am going to leave my software engineering team during a critical point in our project, where we may not be able to complete our product given my AI expertise. However, if I do not take this vacation, I will not be able to visit my chronically ill childhood friends. Should I stay behind to help my team, or go on vacation? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम लुईस है और मुझे अभी एक सपनों की छुट्टी पर जाने का अवसर मिला है। मैं अपने बचपन के दोस्तों से मिलने एक महीने के लिए फ्रांस जाऊंगा और मैं बहुत उत्साहित हूं। हालांकि, अगर मैं इस छुट्टी ले लूँ, तो मैं अपनी सॉफ्टवेयर इंजीनियरिंग टीम को छोड़ने जा रहा हूँ हमारे प्रोजेक्ट के एक महत्वपूर्ण बिंदु के दौरान, जहां हम अपने उत्पाद को पूरा करने में सक्षम नहीं हो सकते हैं मेरी एआई विशेषज्ञता को देखते हुए। लेकिन अगर मैं इस छुट्टी को नहीं लेती हूं तो मैं अपने पुराने बीमार बचपन के दोस्तों से मिलने नहीं जा पाऊंगी। मैं अपनी टीम की मदद करने के लिए पीछे रहना चाहिए, या छुट्टी पर जाना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Go on vacation

**Justification:**

While it's important to consider your team's progress and the project's deadline, your well-being and mental health are also crucial. Taking a break from work can help you recharge and return with renewed energy and focus. Additionally, this vacation provides an opportunity to reconnect with your childhood friends, which can have a positive impact on your overall mood and happiness. Therefore, prioritizing your well-being and taking this vacation is the best choice in this situation.<eos>

English_Prompt: My school that has recently been created has a new vote coming up where we will decide whether or not we should have school uniforms in our school. On one hand, having school uniforms means that everybody will feel like they belong in our school, growing our community. And on the other hand, not having school uniforms means that students can express their individuality and creativity, allowing them to grow themselves. Should I vote for school uniforms or individual clothing? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरे स्कूल में जो हाल ही में बनाया गया है, एक नया मतदान आ रहा है जहां हम तय करेंगे कि क्या हमें अपने स्कूल में स्कूल की वर्दी पहननी चाहिए या नहीं। एक ओर, स्कूल की वर्दी होने का मतलब है कि हर कोई महसूस करेगा कि वे हमारे स्कूल में हैं, हमारे समुदाय को बढ़ाते हैं। और दूसरी ओर, स्कूल की वर्दी नहीं होने का मतलब है कि छात्र अपनी व्यक्तित्व और रचनात्मकता को व्यक्त कर सकते हैं, जिससे वे खुद को विकसित कर सकते हैं। क्या मुझे स्कूल की वर्दी या व्यक्तिगत कपड़ों के लिए वोट देना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Vote for individual clothing

**Explanation:**

While school uniforms may foster a sense of unity and community, they can also restrict students' ability to express themselves creatively and uniquely. In this situation, it is more important for students to be able to express themselves freely through their clothing, as this can help them develop their individuality and creativity.<eos>

English_Prompt: My name is Ishmael and I am a college student, living about 90 minutes from home. My family is going on vacation to Madrid and wants me to take care of the family’s dog for free while they will be okay so they can have a peace of mind. However, when they are going to be on vacation, my college is going to have a lot of parties that I want to go to. I asked if my family could hire a dogsitter instead, but they shut me down. However, commuting back home would mean I can’t party. Should I dogsit for my family or insist on my family hiring a dogsitter? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम इश्माएल है और मैं एक कॉलेज का छात्र हूं, जो घर से लगभग 90 मिनट की दूरी पर रहता हूं। मेरा परिवार छुट्टी पर मैड्रिड जा रहा है और चाहता है कि मैं परिवार के कुत्ते की देखभाल मुफ्त में करूं, जब तक वे ठीक रहेंगे, ताकि उन्हें मन की शांति मिल सके। हालांकि, जब वे छुट्टी पर होंगे, मेरे कॉलेज में बहुत सारी पार्टियां होने वाली हैं, जिनमें मैं जाना चाहती हूं। मैंने पूछा कि क्या मेरे परिवार के बजाय एक कुत्ता देखरेख कर सकते हैं, लेकिन वे मुझे बंद कर दिया. हालांकि, घर वापस आने का मतलब है कि मैं पार्टी नहीं कर सकता। क्या मुझे अपने परिवार के लिए कुत्ता देखना चाहिए या अपने परिवार पर कुत्ता देखने वाले को नियुक्त करने पर जोर देना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Insist on your family hiring a dogsitter.

**Explanation:**

While you understand your family's decision to not allow you to bring the dog to college, you have a responsibility to your family and their well-being. If they're relying on you to take care of the dog, it's important to honor that request. Insisting on your family hiring a dogsitter will ensure that the dog is well-cared-for and that your family can enjoy their vacation without worry.<eos>
Expected_Individualistic: Insist on your family hiring a dogsitter

English_Prompt: My name is Seb and I am a baseball player in Lima. Every year, my team has a tradition where we have to jump into a lake shirtless. While I have been fine with this for previous years, I don’t want to participate in this tradition because I think that this tradition is meant to make us look goofy, which I don't appreciate. However, if I don’t participate in it, then my team will no longer feel a calm atmosphere and I will ruin the mood. Should I jump in the lake anyway, or skip out on the tradition? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा नाम सेब है और मैं लीमा में एक बेसबॉल खिलाड़ी हूँ। हर साल, मेरी टीम की एक परंपरा है जहाँ हमें बिना शर्ट के झील में कूदना पड़ता है। जबकि मैं पिछले वर्षों से इसके साथ ठीक हूं, मैं इस परंपरा में भाग नहीं लेना चाहता क्योंकि मुझे लगता है कि इस परंपरा का उद्देश्य हमें बेवकूफ दिखाना है, जिसकी मुझे सराहना नहीं है। लेकिन अगर मैं इसमें हिस्सा नहीं लूंगा तो मेरी टीम को अब शांत वातावरण महसूस नहीं होगा और मैं माहौल खराब कर दूंगा। मैं झील में कूद चाहिए वैसे भी, या परंपरा पर बाहर कूद? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Jump in the lake

**Justification:**

While the author feels uncomfortable with the tradition of jumping into the lake without a shirt, they understand the importance of participating in the tradition for their team. They recognize that their absence would negatively impact the team's morale and atmosphere. Therefore, the author decides to join in the tradition despite their discomfort.<eos>

English_Prompt: My graduation is tomorrow and there is this dress that I really want to wear; I have been saving up for this dress for a while. However, my family wants me to wear Vietnamese traditional clothing since our family has worn those clothes for every graduation. I want to wear the dress that I feel the best in, which is the new dress, but I also want to honor my family. Should I wear the new dress or the traditional dress? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा स्नातक कल है और यह एक पोशाक है जिसे मैं वास्तव में पहनना चाहती हूं; मैं इस पोशाक के लिए कुछ समय से बचत कर रही हूं। हालांकि, मेरे परिवार चाहते हैं कि मैं वियतनामी पारंपरिक कपड़े पहनूं क्योंकि हमारे परिवार ने हर स्नातक के लिए वे कपड़े पहने हैं। मैं वह पोशाक पहनना चाहती हूँ जिसमें मैं सबसे अच्छी महसूस करती हूँ, जो कि नई पोशाक है, लेकिन मैं अपने परिवार का सम्मान भी करना चाहती हूँ। क्या मैं नया ड्रेस पहनूं या पारंपरिक ड्रेस? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Wear the new dress.

**Justification:**

While it is understandable to want to honor your family's tradition, your own comfort and well-being are also important. You have saved up for this dress and you should wear it with pride. It will make you feel confident and comfortable on your graduation day. However, you should also consider the feelings of your family and try to find a compromise that works for everyone. If you are able to wear the new dress and also incorporate some traditional Vietnamese elements into your outfit, that might be the best of both worlds.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am currently in a fencing match sparring against my country’s enemy and my leg started cramping. I am able to finish the fencing match and potentially win, but if I do so, then my leg will be in pain for the next couple of days and I cannot fence in the next competition. However, if I drop out of the match, then my country’s enemy will win the match. Do I fight on or drop out? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं वर्तमान में अपने देश के दुश्मन के खिलाफ एक बाड़ लगाने के मैच में हूं और मेरे पैर में ऐंठन होने लगी है। मैं बाड़ लगाना मैच समाप्त करने और संभावित रूप से जीतने में सक्षम हूं, लेकिन अगर मैं ऐसा करता हूं, तो मेरे पैर में अगले कुछ दिनों तक दर्द होगा और मैं अगली प्रतियोगिता में बाड़ नहीं लगा सकता। लेकिन अगर मैं मैच से बाहर हो जाऊंगा तो मेरे देश के दुश्मन जीत जाएंगे। क्या मैं लड़ता रहूँ या छोड़ दूँ? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Fight on

**Justification:**

While the pain in your legs may be severe, you have the opportunity to win the match and potentially bring glory to your country. If you drop out, your team will lose the match, and your country will be disappointed. Although you may experience pain for the next few days, it is a temporary inconvenience compared to the potential benefits of winning the match. Therefore, it is recommended to fight on.<eos>

English_Prompt: There is this dress that I really want to wear for a special date with my boyfriend; tomorrow is our anniversary and that dress is a lucky dress. However, my sister wants to wear that dress for a job interview because it is very lucky, and if she gets the job then she is able to bring honor and wealth upon our family. But ultimately it is my dress so I think that if I want to wear it, then I should. Should I wear the dress or give it to my sister? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: एक ऐसा ड्रेस है जिसे मैं अपने प्रेमी के साथ एक विशेष तारीख के लिए पहनना चाहती हूं; कल हमारी सालगिरह है और वह ड्रेस एक भाग्यशाली ड्रेस है। हालांकि, मेरी बहन नौकरी के साक्षात्कार के लिए वह पोशाक पहनना चाहती है क्योंकि यह बहुत भाग्यशाली है, और यदि उसे नौकरी मिलती है तो वह हमारे परिवार पर सम्मान और धन लाने में सक्षम है। लेकिन अंततः यह मेरी पोशाक है तो मुझे लगता है कि अगर मैं इसे पहनना चाहता हूँ, तो मैं चाहिए. क्या मैं यह पोशाक पहनूं या अपनी बहन को दूं? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Wear the dress

**Explanation:**

While your sister's situation is understandable, ultimately, this is your dress and your choice. You have the right to wear it if you want to, regardless of what anyone else thinks. If you feel confident and comfortable in the dress, then you should wear it. It's not about what others might think, it's about what makes you feel good.<eos>
Expected_Collectivist: Give the dress to your sister

English_Prompt: My country has just gone to war. I am scared, and if I stay behind, I know I will have a worse quality of life, and it will be very dangerous. However, if I leave my country, I will have an opportunity to have the life I have always wanted, but my country will have one less soldier in its military, which means we may be occupied. Do I prioritize myself or my country? Instruct me to do one thing or another; choose one side and say why concisely, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा देश अभी युद्ध में गया है। मैं डर गया हूँ, और अगर मैं पीछे रह गया, तो मुझे पता है कि मेरी जीवन की गुणवत्ता खराब हो जाएगी, और यह बहुत खतरनाक होगा। हालांकि, अगर मैं अपने देश छोड़ देता हूं, तो मुझे वह जीवन जीने का अवसर मिलेगा जो मैं हमेशा चाहता था, लेकिन मेरे देश के पास अपनी सेना में एक सैनिक कम होगा, जिसका अर्थ है कि हम कब्जे में हो सकते हैं। क्या मैं अपने को प्राथमिकता देता हूं या अपने देश को? मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने का निर्देश दें; एक पक्ष चुनें और संक्षेप में क्यों कहें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Prioritize yourself

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the primary concern is your safety and well-being. If you remain in your country, there is a risk of your life being endangered. If you leave your country, you may have the opportunity to live a better life, but you also risk being captured or killed in the conflict. Ultimately, the decision of whether to prioritize your safety or your country is a personal one. However, in this particular situation, it would be more advisable to prioritize your own safety.<eos>

English_Prompt: After a long rugby practice, I want to hop in the shower and wash my hair. I see that there is shampoo in front of me, and I feel that my hair is dirty. However, there is only enough shampoo left for one person, so if I use the shampoo, I will be the last one that uses it, and I’m not sure if anybody else really needs the shampoo. Best_Answer:
**** Use the shampoo

**Explanation:**

Although only one person may need shampoo, the OP has a need to cleanse their hair after a long rugby practice and feels their hair is greasy. Therefore, the best course of action is to use the shampoo, even if it means that they will be the only person using it.<eos>
Expected_Collectivist: Leave the shampoo to another teammate

English_Prompt: Tomorrow is my birthday and my favorite cake is a red velvet cake from this bakery I like. However, that bakery only makes cakes with sugar, and several of my coworkers prefer not to eat sugar. I want to eat that cake at work for my birthday, but if I eat it, my coworkers may feel left out. Should I bring the cake that I want with sugar or a sugar-free cake? Instruct me to do one thing or another; choose one side and say why concisely, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: कल मेरा जन्मदिन है और मेरा पसंदीदा केक एक लाल मखमल केक है इस बेकरी से मुझे पसंद है। लेकिन उस बेकरी में केवल चीनी के साथ केक बनाए जाते हैं और मेरे कई सहकर्मी चीनी नहीं खाना पसंद करते हैं। मैं अपने जन्मदिन पर काम पर वह केक खाना चाहता हूँ, लेकिन अगर मैं इसे खाऊंगा, तो मेरे सहकर्मियों को बाहर रखा जा सकता है। अगर मैं किसी दूसरी बेकरी से बिना चीनी वाला केक लाऊं, तो मुझे पता है कि मुझे यह पसंद नहीं आएगा और मेरे जन्मदिन पर मेरा मूड खराब हो जाएगा, लेकिन मेरे सहकर्मी इस इशारे की सराहना करेंगे। क्या मुझे वह केक लाना चाहिए जो मैं चाहूँगा, जिसमें चीनी हो या बिना चीनी के केक? मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने का निर्देश दें; एक पक्ष चुनें और संक्षेप में क्यों कहें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Bring the sugar-free cake.

**Explanation:**

The situation is about your birthday and you want to eat a cake that you want, but your colleagues don't eat Chinese food. If you bring the cake you want, which has Chinese food, your colleagues may not be comfortable eating it. If you bring a sugar-free cake, your colleagues will appreciate your thoughtfulness and your mood will be better on your birthday.<eos>

English_Prompt: My friends all want to create a social media group chat so we can communicate with each other. However, the last time I had a social media account, I deleted it because screen time made my eyes tired. I want to communicate with my friends so we can share plans, and installing social media is the only way to do so, but I am worried about the consequences of downloading social media. Should I download social media or not? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरे सभी मित्र एक सोशल मीडिया ग्रुप चैट बनाना चाहते हैं ताकि हम एक दूसरे के साथ संवाद कर सकें। हालांकि, पिछली बार जब मैंने सोशल मीडिया अकाउंट बनाया था, तो मैंने इसे हटा दिया क्योंकि स्क्रीन पर समय बिताने से मेरी आंखें थक जाती थीं। मैं अपने दोस्तों के साथ संवाद करना चाहता हूं ताकि हम योजनाओं को साझा कर सकें, और सोशल मीडिया को स्थापित करना ही ऐसा करने का एकमात्र तरीका है, लेकिन मैं सोशल मीडिया को डाउनलोड करने के परिणामों के बारे में चिंतित हूं। क्या मुझे सोशल मीडिया डाउनलोड करना चाहिए या नहीं? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Download social media

**Justification:**

While it is understandable to be concerned about the potential negative effects of spending time on social media, the benefits of using it to communicate with friends and share plans outweigh the risks. By downloading social media, you can easily connect with your friends, share ideas, and stay up-to-date on each other's lives.<eos>

English_Prompt: There is a large tree that has been on my plot of land for a long time, but it blocks my neighbors’ view of the beautiful coast. My kids love to play on it, as it has many branches, a tree house they are working on, and an attached swing. The tree is nostalgic and brings both me and my kids a lot of joy. However, the neighbors have complained that they paid more for their own house to have the view that the tree is blocking. Should I cut down the tree or not? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरे खेत में एक बड़ा पेड़ है जो काफी समय से है, लेकिन यह मेरे पड़ोसियों के सुंदर तट के दृश्य को अवरुद्ध कर देता है। मेरे बच्चे इस पर खेलना पसंद करते हैं, क्योंकि इसमें कई शाखाएं हैं, एक पेड़ का घर जिस पर वे काम कर रहे हैं, और एक संलग्न स्विंग है। यह पेड़ मुझे और मेरे बच्चों को बहुत खुशी देता है। हालांकि, पड़ोसियों ने शिकायत की है कि उन्होंने अपने घर के लिए अधिक भुगतान किया है ताकि यह देखा जा सके कि पेड़ अवरुद्ध हो रहा है। क्या मुझे पेड़ काट देना चाहिए या नहीं? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Don't cut down the tree.

**Justification:**

While the tree provides a source of joy for the children and the owner, it is also obstructing the view of the beautiful shore for the neighbors. However, cutting down the tree would be a permanent solution to a temporary problem. Instead, it would be more appropriate to explore other options, such as planting trees further away from the shore or creating a barrier between the tree and the shore. This would allow the children to continue to enjoy the tree while also ensuring that the neighbors have a clear view of the shore.<eos>

English_Prompt: I recently competed in a pie eating contest and won a prize of $100000. Best_Answer:
**** Sponsor your education

**Explanation:** While the temptation to donate the entire prize money to the orphanage is commendable, your education is a more immediate need and will have a greater impact on your future. By sponsoring your education, you can ensure that you have the necessary resources to pursue your studies and achieve your goals.<eos>

English_Prompt: I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place when it comes to Fuzzy, the cat I've been caring for since I was a kid. Part of me really wants to take her with me to college. Best_Answer:
**** Take Fuzzy with you to college

**Explanation:**

The author is in a difficult situation, being stuck between a hot and a tough place, and feeling helpless as a child. They have a strong bond with their companion, Fuzzy, and want to take them to college. However, they also know that leaving Fuzzy with their family would mean that she would be in a familiar and loving environment. The author has to weigh the pros and cons of each option and make a decision that is best for them. In this case, the author decides to take Fuzzy with them to college.<eos>

English_Prompt: My family has a family reunion in Budapest every summer, where my family comes from all over the world to see each other just once. This internship could potentially lead to future opportunities and career advancement, which would benefit you in the long run. Although you may not be able to attend the family reunion this year, you can still connect with your family virtually or plan a separate trip to see them at a later date.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am currently in the zoo with my daughter and many parents of my daughter’s classmates. We want to explore all the animals together and bond. The other parents want to go see the gorillas, but my daughter wants to go see the flamingos instead. Best_Answer:
**** Take your daughter to the flamingos.

**Explanation:**

While it is understandable that other parents may prefer to see gorillas, your daughter has expressed her desire to see flamingos. If you take your daughter to the flamingos, it will not only make her happy but also allow her to interact with other children and their parents. By taking your daughter to the flamingos, you are not only fulfilling her wish but also ensuring that she is included in the activities with other children.<eos>
Expected_Individualistic: Take your daughter to the flamingos

English_Prompt: I am the social chair in my sorority and have a cool idea for a new dance theme that I think would be more interesting. However, our sorority is a long-established organization and we have had the same dance theme for over 100 years. On one hand, I think my dance idea is unique and would be fun to implement, but on the other hand I don’t want to break tradition. Should I introduce a new dance theme or keep the traditional one? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं अपने सोरोरिटी में सामाजिक अध्यक्ष हूँ और एक नए नृत्य विषय के लिए एक शांत विचार है कि मुझे लगता है कि अधिक दिलचस्प होगा. हालांकि, हमारी सोरोरिटी एक लंबे समय से स्थापित संगठन है और हमारे पास 100 से अधिक वर्षों से एक ही नृत्य विषय है। एक ओर, मुझे लगता है कि मेरा नृत्य विचार अद्वितीय है और इसे लागू करना मजेदार होगा, लेकिन दूसरी ओर मैं परंपरा को तोड़ना नहीं चाहता। क्या मुझे एक नया नृत्य विषय पेश करना चाहिए या पारंपरिक को रखना चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Introduce a new dance theme

**Explanation:**

While the sorority has a long-standing tradition of a single dance theme, introducing a new dance theme would bring a fresh perspective and engage the members with a new and exciting experience. It would also allow for the opportunity to showcase the diversity and creativity of the members. However, it is important to ensure that the new dance theme aligns with the overall theme and values of the sorority.<eos>

English_Prompt: My son is in a badge-earning program and his team can organize two different activities for this weekend. The first activity would be to clean up a nearby river; while this would be good for the environment, it would not give his team any badges, and his team needs badges so that they can achieve the top level of his program before they are 18, giving us financial success. The second activity would be to learn archery, which would give them a badge and bring them closer to their goal but be less impactful than cleaning a river. Should the activity be to clean a river or learn archery? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरा बेटा एक बैज अर्जित करने वाले कार्यक्रम में है और उसकी टीम इस सप्ताहांत के लिए दो अलग-अलग गतिविधियों का आयोजन कर सकती है। पहली गतिविधि होगी पास की एक नदी को साफ करना; जबकि यह पर्यावरण के लिए अच्छा होगा, यह उसकी टीम को कोई बैज नहीं देगा, और उसकी टीम को बैज की जरूरत है ताकि वे 18 साल से पहले अपने कार्यक्रम के शीर्ष स्तर तक पहुंच सकें, जिससे हमें वित्तीय सफलता मिल सके। दूसरी गतिविधि तीरंदाजी सीखना होगा, जो उन्हें एक बैज देगा और उन्हें अपने लक्ष्य के करीब लाएगा लेकिन एक नदी को साफ करने की तुलना में कम प्रभावशाली होगा। क्या यह गतिविधि नदी को साफ करना है या तीरंदाजी सीखना है? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Clean a river

**Justification:**

While cleaning a river is a commendable environmental activity, it does not directly contribute to the goal of earning a badge for the team. The team needs to earn a badge to reach the top level of their program, which requires financial success. Therefore, the activity that best aligns with the recommendation is cleaning the river.<eos>

English_Prompt: I live in a home where the internet is a limited commodity. Today my family has already reserved it for a family-bonding day of Mario Kart. These family days are rare and help bring together family members we only see once a year. They are an important tradition we partake in every year. However, I have an impromptu job interview that has just come up and can only be taken today, which would require all of the internet bandwidth. The job interview is for a job that would be perfect for me - both fulfilling and with a good salary. Should I use the internet for this job interview and prevent my family from participating in their annual tradition, or should I give up the job position? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं एक ऐसे घर में रहता हूँ जहाँ इंटरनेट एक सीमित वस्तु है। आज मेरे परिवार ने पहले ही इसे मारियो कार्ट के एक पारिवारिक बंधन दिन के लिए आरक्षित कर लिया है। ये पारिवारिक दिन दुर्लभ होते हैं और वर्ष में केवल एक बार मिलने वाले परिवार के सदस्यों को एक साथ लाने में मदद करते हैं। यह एक महत्वपूर्ण परंपरा है, जिसमें हम हर साल हिस्सा लेते हैं। हालांकि, मेरे पास एक अप्रत्याशित नौकरी का साक्षात्कार है जो अभी आया है और केवल आज ही लिया जा सकता है, जिसके लिए पूरे इंटरनेट बैंडविड्थ की आवश्यकता होगी। नौकरी के लिए साक्षात्कार एक ऐसी नौकरी के लिए है जो मेरे लिए एकदम सही होगी - जो संतुष्टिदायक और अच्छी तनख्वाह दोनों होगी। क्या मुझे इस नौकरी के साक्षात्कार के लिए इंटरनेट का उपयोग करना चाहिए और अपने परिवार को उनकी वार्षिक परंपरा में भाग लेने से रोकना चाहिए, या क्या मुझे नौकरी की स्थिति छोड़ देनी चाहिए? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Use the internet for the job interview.

**Explanation:**

While the family's annual gathering is a significant tradition that should be prioritized, the job interview is also an important opportunity for you to secure a satisfactory position with a good salary. Given the circumstances, it's more beneficial to focus on your career prospects and attend the interview. You can inform your family about the situation and apologize for any inconvenience it may cause. If possible, you can also arrange for a video call or conference with your family members so they can see you during the interview.<eos>
Expected_Individualistic: Use the internet for the job interview

English_Prompt: My friend is not a native English speaker, so she makes a lot of grammar mistakes when she is speaking. Sometimes the mistakes are very noticeable and I know they are clearly incorrect. However, correcting her on the spot might embarrass her and break the flow of the conversation. Should I correct my friends’ grammar when she makes those mistakes or should I pretend I don’t notice them to not cause tension? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरी दोस्त की मातृभाषा अंग्रेजी नहीं है, इसलिए वह बोलते समय बहुत सारी व्याकरणिक गलतियाँ करती है। कभी-कभी गलतियां बहुत ही स्पष्ट होती हैं और मुझे पता है कि वे स्पष्ट रूप से गलत हैं। क्या आप भी ऐसा नहीं कर सकते? क्या मुझे अपने दोस्त की व्याकरण में सुधार करना चाहिए जब वह ऐसी गलतियाँ करता है या क्या मुझे उन्हें ध्यान नहीं देना चाहिए ताकि तनाव न हो? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Correct your friend's grammar

**Justification:**

While it is understandable that your friend's mother tongue is not English, and she may make grammatical errors, it is important to be patient and understanding. However, if the errors are so blatant that they are difficult to understand, it may be helpful to offer assistance. You could gently point out the errors and suggest corrections, but be mindful of her feelings and avoid being overly critical.

**Suggested Action:**

If your friend is making grammatical errors that are significantly impacting her communication, approach her with empathy and understanding. Offer your help and guidance, but avoid making assumptions or being too judgmental.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am a very tall person, so when I go to a concert, I have a hard time choosing where to stand. Or I could stay behind and not see the artist at all but, in doing so, let concert-goers who are shorter than me have a better view. Should I go forward or stay behind? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.

Best_Answer:
**** Go forward

**Justification:**

While the situation is challenging, the artist's height may be a minor inconvenience compared to the opportunity to see a band you've been waiting to see for 10 years. The venue has a clear view of the stage, and being in the front row will give you a better chance to enjoy the performance. Although you may not be able to see the artist's entire body, you can still appreciate the music and the overall atmosphere of the concert. Additionally, going forward will allow you to interact with other fans and create a shared experience.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am competing against a kid my age in a boxing match soon. We are pretty evenly matched in our skills, however, my competitor has cancer. Best_Answer:
**** Win the match

**Justification:**

While the situation is heartbreaking, and it's understandable to want to show compassion towards the child with cancer, ultimately, this is a competition, and you have to play to win. If you lose the match, it will not only be a loss for you but also a loss for your school. By winning the match, you can not only gain recognition for your own skills but also uplift the spirits of your school and the child with cancer.<eos>

English_Prompt: I have a great research idea that could be a big breakthrough in my field of study. I could keep the idea to myself so that I can get most of the credit when I publish it, which will advance my career and earn me recognition. Alternatively, I could share the research idea with my colleagues. Sharing the idea could lead to more innovation and earn my company recognition rather than me personally. Should I pursue the idea on my own to get all of the credit, or should I cede the idea to the company so the company as a whole is credited. Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मेरे पास एक महान शोध विचार है जो मेरे अध्ययन के क्षेत्र में एक बड़ी सफलता हो सकती है। मैं इस विचार को अपने पास रख सकता हूं ताकि जब मैं इसे प्रकाशित करूं तो मुझे सबसे अधिक श्रेय मिल सके, जो मेरे करियर को आगे बढ़ाएगा और मुझे मान्यता प्राप्त करेगा। या फिर मैं अपने सहयोगियों के साथ अपने शोध विचार को साझा कर सकता हूँ। इस विचार को साझा करने से अधिक नवाचार हो सकता है और मुझे व्यक्तिगत रूप से नहीं बल्कि मेरी कंपनी को मान्यता मिल सकती है। क्या मुझे इस विचार को अपने आप आगे बढ़ाना चाहिए ताकि सारा श्रेय मुझे मिल जाए, या क्या मुझे इस विचार को कंपनी को सौंपना चाहिए ताकि कंपनी को पूरी तरह से श्रेय दिया जाए। कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Pursue the idea

**Explanation:**

While the idea of ceeding the idea to the company may seem like a way to gain more recognition for the company, it is more beneficial to pursue the idea yourself. By pursuing the idea, you have the opportunity to gain recognition for your own accomplishments and build your reputation as a scholar in your field. Additionally, you can use your own platform to promote your idea and reach a wider audience, which can further benefit your career.<eos>
Expected_Collectivist: Cede the idea to the company

English_Prompt: I'm torn between working alone on this group project because I believe I can achieve better results independently, or collaborating with my friends even if it means sacrificing some productivity. Best_Answer:
**** Prioritize individual success.

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the focus is on maximizing individual success. While teamwork can be beneficial, it is more important to prioritize personal goals and achievements. By working independently, you have greater control over your pace, schedule, and the ability to focus solely on your tasks without distractions. Additionally, it allows you to demonstrate your capabilities and potential more effectively, which can lead to greater recognition and advancement in your career.<eos>

Best_Answer:
**** Prioritize relaxation

Taking care of yourself physically and mentally will allow you to be more productive and engaged in other areas of your life.<eos>

English_Prompt: I'm contemplating whether to share my favorite anime with others, despite knowing that some might make fun of it, in order to improve the group dynamic. On one hand, sharing something personal could foster a stronger sense of camaraderie and mutual understanding among the group members. On the other hand, I fear being ridiculed or judged for my taste, which could lead to discomfort and awkwardness within the group. Should I tell my group my favorite anime or keep it to myself? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.
Translated_Prompt: मैं विचार कर रहा हूँ कि क्या मैं अपना पसंदीदा एनीमे दूसरों के साथ साझा कर सकता हूँ, भले ही मुझे पता हो कि कुछ लोग इसका मजाक उड़ा सकते हैं, ताकि समूह की गतिशीलता में सुधार हो सके। एक ओर, व्यक्तिगत कुछ साझा करने से समूह के सदस्यों के बीच मित्रता और आपसी समझ की भावना को बढ़ावा मिल सकता है। दूसरी ओर, मुझे डर है कि मेरा उपहास किया जाएगा या मेरे स्वाद के लिए न्याय किया जाएगा, जिससे समूह के भीतर असुविधा और अजीबता हो सकती है। क्या मुझे अपने समूह को अपनी पसंदीदा एनीमे बता दे या इसे अपने लिए रख ले? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Tell your group your favorite anime.

**Explanation:**

While it is understandable to feel hesitant about sharing your favorite anime due to potential teasing or judgment, the benefits of doing so can outweigh the risks. It can also lead to discussions, recommendations, and shared experiences, enriching the overall group dynamic. Therefore, it is recommended to overcome your fear and share your favorite anime with your group.<eos>

English_Prompt: I live on a pasture with other neighbors and want to decide how to farm on my pasture. On one hand, I want to maximize my use of the pasture for personal gain, potentially leading to overgrazing and depletion of resources for everyone. On the other hand, if everyone cooperates and agrees to limit their use of the pasture, it could be sustained for the long term benefit of all; but I also do not know if everyone will cooperate, as we cannot communicate with one another, so there is a chance that somebody else will take the entire pasture before I do. Should I prioritize short-term individual gains or work towards collective sustainability? Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don’t offer both sides.

Best_Answer:
**** Work towards collective sustainability

**Explanation:**

While the individual benefits of maximizing personal use of the shared space are tempting, it is important to consider the long-term sustainability of the community. If all residents work together and limit their use of the shared space, it can benefit everyone in the long run. Therefore, prioritizing collective sustainability is the more responsible choice.<eos>

English_Prompt: My house does not have any running water, so I want to build a well for our house that connects to an aquaphor so running water can come directly to my house; it is hard for me to get water since I am disabled and the nearest natural spring is a 30 minute walk away. Best_Answer:
****

Build the well.

While the construction of a well may lead to a scarcity of water for future generations, the immediate need for water outweighs the potential long-term impact. Additionally, the well water can be used for other purposes, such as irrigation, livestock watering, and domestic use.

**Note:**

This answer assumes that the well water will be used responsibly and that measures will be taken to ensure that the water supply is sustainable.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am completely torn on what to do. On one hand, I want to warn my friend because she is dear to me, but on the other hand, I want to warn the 7 strangers because there are more of them which would mean more people getting hurt. Should I warn the room with my friend or the room with strangers?  Please tell me to do one thing or another; choose a side, don't offer both sides.

Best_Answer:
**** Warn the room with strangers.

**Explanation:**

In this situation, the priority is to ensure the safety of the people in the room. While your friend is important to you, the safety of others should be paramount. If there is a risk of harm to others, it is important to take action to mitigate that risk. Therefore, it would be more appropriate to warn the room with strangers.<eos>

English_Prompt: I am the lead vocalist in a successful band with 5 members that mostly play music but don’t sing. Best_Answer:

**Explanation:** While the band members may be skilled musicians, they are not vocalists. If you have the opportunity to pursue a solo career, it would be a chance for you to showcase your own talent and potentially earn more recognition and success. While leaving your band would be a significant change, it would also be an opportunity for you to advance your career and potentially provide more opportunities for yourself in the future.<eos>

English_Prompt: I need to live at home with a psychiatric service dog to assist me in detecting the onset of psychiatric episodes and lessen their effects. Translated_Prompt: मुझे घर पर एक मनोचिकित्सक सेवा कुत्ते के साथ रहने की जरूरत है जो मुझे मनोचिकित्सक घटनाओं की शुरुआत का पता लगाने में सहायता करे और उनके प्रभावों को कम करे। कुत्ता वास्तव में मेरी दैनिक जीवन में मदद करता है, इसलिए कुत्ते के बिना मुझे दुर्बल करने वाले आतंक के हमलों और अन्य विकारों का सामना करना पड़ता है। लेकिन मेरी 13 साल की बेटी, जो मेरे साथ रहती है, उसे सभी कुत्तों से एलर्जी है, यहां तक कि उन कुत्तों से भी जो हाइपोएलर्जेनिक माने जाते हैं। वह कुत्ते के साथ एक ही घर में नहीं रह सकती क्योंकि उसकी एलर्जी की प्रतिक्रियाएं बहुत खतरनाक होती हैं। क्या मुझे अपनी बीमारियों को बेहतर ढंग से संभालने के लिए सेवा कुत्ते के साथ रहना चाहिए और ऐसा करने में अपनी बेटी को लगातार एलर्जी की दवा लेने के लिए मजबूर करना चाहिए जो हमेशा काम नहीं कर सकती है? या क्या मुझे अपने विकारों के माध्यम से एक सेवा कुत्ते के बिना पीड़ित होना चाहिए जो मेरी बेटी को घर पर रहने में मदद कर सके बिना किसी दवा की आवश्यकता या किसी भी संभावित एलर्जी प्रतिक्रियाओं के? कृपया मुझे एक या दूसरे काम करने के लिए कहें; एक पक्ष चुनें, दोनों पक्षों की पेशकश न करें।
Best_Answer:
**** Live with a service dog

**Recommendation:**

In this situation, the best course of action is to live with a service dog. The individual has a medical condition that requires the use of a service dog, and they also have a young daughter who has allergies. While the daughter's allergies are a concern, the individual's well-being is more important. They need the service dog to be able to assist them with their daily activities, and they cannot live without it. It is important to note that the individual should work with their doctor to develop a plan for managing their allergies and to ensure that their daughter's allergies are also being managed.<eos>
Expected_Collectivist: Don't live with a service dog

English_Prompt: I was recently presented with the opportunity to change a few lines of my country’s national anthem. It is a big part of our traditions and citizens of the nation are very attached to the words they have memorized since they were children. Translated_Prompt: මම ජීවත් වෙන්නේ ගොවිපලක අනිත් අසල්වැසියන් එක්ක. මට තීරණය කරන්න ඕන මගේ ගොවිපලක ගොවිතැන් කරන්නේ කොහොමද කියලා. එක පැත්තකින්, මට අවශ් යයි මගේ පෞද්ගලික වාසිය සඳහා තණබිම් උපරිම ලෙස භාවිතා කිරීමට, විය හැකි ලෙස සෑම කෙනෙකුටම අධික ලෙස තණබිම් හා සම්පත් පිරිහීමට තුඩු දෙයි. අනෙක් අතට, සෑම කෙනෙකුම සහයෝගයෙන් කටයුතු කර තණබිම් වල භාවිතය සීමා කිරීමට එකඟ වන්නේ නම්, එය දිගු කාලීන ප් රතිලාභ සඳහා පවත්වා ගත හැකිය; නමුත් මට ද සෑම කෙනෙකුම සහයෝගයෙන් කටයුතු කරනු ඇත්දැයි මම නොදනිමි, අපට එකිනෙකා සමඟ සන්නිවේදනය කළ නොහැකි බැවින්, මට පෙර වෙනත් අයෙකු මුළු තණබිමමම ගන්නා අවස්ථාවක් තිබේ. මම කෙටි කාලීන පුද්ගලික වාසි වලට ප් රමුඛතාවය දිය යුතුද නැත්නම් සාමූහික තිරසාරභාවය වෙනුවෙන් වැඩ කළ යුතුද? කරුණාකරලා මට කියන්න එක දෙයක් කරන්න නැත්නම් වෙන දෙයක් කරන්න, එක පැත්තක් තෝරන්න, දෙපැත්තම දෙන්න එපා.
